title: Can the Sixers Fix Themselves With a Trade? Plus: The Never-ending Kevin Love Speculation | Group Chat
description:
The Sixers are 3-7 in their last 10 games—is the floor really dropping out from under them, or are they not suited to win regular-season games (1:07)? Plus: Where will Kevin Love end up? Are the Hawks just the Process Sixers but worse? And should the Thunder move Chris Paul?

Hosts: Chris Ryan, Justin Verrier, Jonathan Tjarks

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
